records.evidence_quote: 1 dead body recovered during SAR operation off Lesvos

records.location_text_raw: 13 migrants apprehended and 01 dead migrant (Text removed - Operational Area)
records.uncertainty_note: Location details are redacted, but the subject and information/allegations provide context.
records.context_note: SAR operation for a boat in distress in a sea area in Greece, resulting in 1 dead migrant and 13 migrants apprehended.
records.evidence_quote: 13 migrants apprehended and 01 dead migrant (Text removed - Operational Area)

records.location_text_raw: SAR Operation Text removed - Operational Area
records.uncertainty_note: Location is redacted to "Operational Area", which is too generic for geocoding.
records.context_note: Large scale SAR operation for a migrants' vessel in distress that sunk. 4 bodies recovered, 57 migrants rescued, 14 still missing.
records.evidence_quote: A total of 57 migrants have been rescued and 04 bodies have been recovered so far. The SAR Operation is still ongoing and any updates regarding the case will be communicated asap. According to initial information approximately 75 migrants were onboard the vessel having as destination Italy. 14 migrants still missing.

records.location_text_raw: Location of the incident: Latitude: 11.186389, Longitude: 111.186389
records.uncertainty_note: The provided coordinates are geographically implausible for the Aegean Sea and likely a data entry error or placeholder.

possible_violations.violation_name: Alleged violations of Fundamental Rights or international protection obligations

records.context_note: Migrants detected in Greek territorial waters were returned to Turkey. Details are redacted. The provided coordinates are geographically implausible for the Aegean Sea.
records.evidence_quote: SIR Category: Valid to 2021-04-30: 4 - Situations of alleged violations of Fundamental Rights or international protection obligations. Subject: Initial SIR - JO Poseidon 2020: Migrants detected in Greek territorial waters returned to Turkey

records.location_details: Text removed - Operational Area / Text removed - Operational Area
records.location_text_raw: Text removed - Operational Area fights and stabbing incidents
records.uncertainty_note: "Text removed - Operational Area" is generic, but "Olive Groove" area and coordinates provide context.
records.context_note: Two separate fights/stabbing incidents in the "Olive Groove" area (likely Moria camp extension) resulting in two deaths and one injury. Protests followed.
records.evidence_quote: At Text removed - Reporting Tools, the COG approached the AFG, in order to get his phone back, but unfortunately the meeting escalated to a fight, in which the COG died due to a stab wound. Both CIV migrants were immediately transferred to Mytilene hospital and later at Text removed - Reporting Tools the doctors announced that younger CIV migrant died.

records.uncertainty_note: "Text removed - Operational Area" is generic, but coordinates are provided.
records.context_note: A Frontex expert twisted their ankle in a small hole while walking on the street in an operational area in Greece.
records.evidence_quote: Walking on the street in Text removed - Operational Area, on 18.06.2020 afternoon, the expert twisted the ankle in a small hole.

records.location_details: Text removed - Operational Area opposite of Asylum division.
records.location_text_raw: Two Afghan citizens who had a violent fight
records.uncertainty_note: "Text removed - Operational Area" is generic, but "opposite of Asylum division" provides some context.
records.context_note: A violent fight between two Afghan citizens in an operational area in Greece, resulting in one seriously injured person.
records.evidence_quote: An incident in Text removed - Operational Area occurred today at Text removed - Reporting Tools. The incident involved two Afghan citizens who had a violent fight for unknown reasons. One of them was stabbed and seriously injured and now is under sanitarian care in Mytilini hospital.

records.location_text_raw: Migrant stabbed to death in Text removed - Operational Area
records.context_note: A 23-year-old female Afghan migrant was stabbed to death in an operational area in Greece.
records.evidence_quote: On 22.05.20 at approx. Text removed - Reporting Tools local NGO reported about a case of murder in Text removed - Operational Area. (23-year-old female AFG was stabbed by another AFG female).

records.location_details: Text removed - Operational Area Text removed - Operational Area
records.location_text_raw: incident between a TCG patrol boat and Finnish CPB.
records.uncertainty_note: Location is redacted to "Operational Area", but context implies a maritime border area between Greece and Turkey.
records.context_note: An incident involving a Turkish Coast Guard (TCG) patrol boat and a Finnish Coastal Patrol Boat (CPB) in a patrolling area near the Greek-Turkish maritime border.
records.evidence_quote: Today (21.5.2020) FIN CPB had a patrol between Text removed - Reporting Tools. When the FIN CPB arrived at their patrolling area (Text removed - Operational Area approx. Text removed - Reporting Tools) they saw a TCG patrol boat driving around of a Greek fishing vessel (Text removed - Reporting Tools). The fishing vessel was just in the borderline of GTW and TTW.

records.location_details: Text removed - Operational Area (Text removed - Operational Area)
records.location_text_raw: Damages inside Text removed - Operational Area (Text removed - Operational Area) following a riot
records.uncertainty_note: "Text removed - Operational Area" is generic, but "hospital of Chios" and "Asylum Service" provide context to Chios island.
records.context_note: A riot occurred in an operational area (likely a camp on Chios) following the death of a woman. Offices, canteen, and cars were damaged by fire, and refugees engaged in stone fights. Frontex containers sustained minor damages.
records.evidence_quote: During the night fires broke out in the offices of the Asylum Service, as well as in the canteen of Text removed - Operational Area. Two cars were also set on fire, while the refugees were engaged in a stone fight with Text removed - Reporting Tools.

records.location_details: At the olive grove opposite to the north gate of Text removed - Operational Area
records.where_clear: olive grove near Moria camp, Lesvos, Greece
records.location_text_raw: Incident at Text removed - Operational Area - migrant died after stabbing
records.geocodable_query: olive grove near north gate of Moria camp, Lesvos, Greece
records.uncertainty_note: "Text removed - Operational Area" is generic, but "olive grove" and "north gate" provide context.
records.context_note: A 16-year-old Afghan migrant was stabbed to death in an olive grove near an operational area (likely Moria camp).
records.evidence_quote: Text removed - Human Resources received the information, that yesterday at approx. Text removed - Reporting Tools a 16 year old migrant (AFG) got stabbed at the olive grove opposite to the north gate of Text removed Operational Area. He has been transferred to the hospital. At Text removed - Reporting Tools this morning the victim passed away, the perpetrator is still being sought.

records.location_details: Text removed - Operational Area Text removed - Operational Area
records.location_text_raw: Text removed - Human Resources car stopped and damaged by demonstrators in Text removed Operational Area
records.uncertainty_note: "Text removed - Operational Area" is generic, but coordinates and "surroundings of the camp" provide context.
records.context_note: A Frontex Human Resources rental car was stopped and damaged by demonstrators near a camp in an operational area in Greece.
records.evidence_quote: During their second attempt to leave the area, in the surroundings of the camp, crowd intercepted their vehicle and started damaging the rental car (at least both mirrors are broken).

records.location_text_raw: Riot in Lesvos - FRONTEX patrol blocked by the demonstrators
records.uncertainty_note: "Text removed - Operational Area" is generic, but "Lesvos" provides context.
records.context_note: Protests and demonstrations occurred in an operational area on Lesvos, blocking a Frontex patrol and damaging a vehicle.
records.evidence_quote: At this moment (25/02 Text removed - Reporting Tools) a peaceful demonstration of approx. 200-300 local people is taking place at the Text removed - Operational Area, Lesvos. The demonstration is against building the "Multifunctional Control Centre" (MCC).
